mapper.insert: insert into lecture (id, lecture_name, thumbnails, introduce, deailed, amount, coursetime, stoptime, coursesite, state_lecture) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lectureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coursetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{coursesite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateLecture,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update lecture set lecture_name = #{lectureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnails = #{thumbnails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deailed = #{deailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, coursetime = #{coursetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stoptime = #{stoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coursesite = #{coursesite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state_lecture = #{stateLecture,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, lecture_name, thumbnails, introduce, deailed, amount, coursetime, stoptime, coursesite, state_lecture from lecture where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, lecture_name, thumbnails, introduce, deailed, amount, coursetime, stoptime, coursesite, state_lecture from lecture
